    The story of Lucius II continues where the original left  off:  Lucius
    emerges as the lone survivor of the burning wreckage his  parents once
    called home, unscathed from the ruthless slaughter he  had  unleashed.
    He had taken the weak and punished the wicked. He had  looked  through
    their souls and found the true selves they had been hiding.  Lucius is
    taken to the psychiatric ward of St.
